notes:
This dataset  contains information about conflict events in the Lake Chad basin crisis region as compiled by ACLED.   Data is encoded as utf-8.  The second row of each CSV contains [HXL](http://hxlstandard.org) tags.

The data is compiled from two other datasets:

* [ACLED Realtime 2016](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/acled-conflict-data-for-africa-realtime-2016)
* [ACLED Version 6, 1997 - 2015](https://data.hdx.rwlabs.org/dataset/acled-conflict-data-for-africa-1997-2015)

More about ACLED data can be found here:  http://www.acleddata.com/
